title: The Blue Table
provenance_text:
Nicholas Georgiadis [1923-2001], London, England, until December 1955 [1]; Ruth Einstein Wilner (Mrs. J. Alfred Wilner) [1909-2010], Pittsburgh, PA and New York, NY, December 1955 until May 1975 [2]; her gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1975.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 111 at "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. 
[2]. Mrs. Wilner purchased the painting from the International for $280 on December 5, 1955. She had moved to New York City by the time she donated the painting to the museum.
